title: Saganism
content: Totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo consciousness vastness is bearable only through love Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium concept of the number one Rig Veda? Stirred by starlight made in the interiors of collapsing stars the ash of stellar alchemy inconspicuous motes of rock and gas network of wormholes the carbon in our apple pies and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

title: Neil deGrasse Tyson Ipsum
content: Big ideas, big ambitious projects need to be embedded within culture at a level deeper than the political winds. It needs to be deeper than the economic fluctuations that could turn people against an expensive project because they're on an unemployment line and can't feed their families.
